textBox.richText: Here are some .pdf documents I’ve made and collected for organizing the start of my world history class each year. Please leave the author’s name on items if you use them. If you find something especially useful, or are looking for a particular item, please let me know. Downloads - Here are the ones I have added today: History Writing Commandments-Schlabach.pdf Essay Rubric from Student's Friend.pdf Letter of Introduction for World History Classes 2007.pdf (Bylo Chacón) World History Syllabus 2007-08.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Partner Syllabus Quiz 2007.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Specific Sub Plans (sample) 2006.pdf (Bylo Chacón) General Sub Information (sample) 2007.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Teaching Methodology Unit Variety Checklist 2007.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Interactive Notebook Information 2004.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Class Policies 2007.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Class Policies 2007.pdf (Bylo Chacón) 2007-08 Plan for World History.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Unit 1 Outline - Gov, Democ, Revol.pdf (Bylo Chacón) Honors World History Option 2004.pdf (Bylo Chacón)
